metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14634 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - negligible.
metadata.Description:
In libsndfile 1.0.28, a divide-by-zero error exists in the function double64_init() in double64.c, which may lead to DoS when playing a crafted audio file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14634` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsndfile1 - 1.0.28-6
sndfile-programs - 1.0.28-6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsndfile package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.28-6').
